properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 3:53AM EST until January 9 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 3
to 5 feet expected for Long Island Sound.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY, New York Harbor and South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet
through Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY
